item.title: Innovation and Technology Management in Agriculture, Biotechnology and Chemicals
item.description: Food supply security Three technologies are key to ensuring security of food supply: seeds, fertilizers and crop protection chemicals. Society demands that each are used in ways that result in no adverse environmental impacts.

item.title: Hello Blog in R
item.description: This shows how to run lm, tidy the output and format it for publication

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.
